meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be driven.
meanings.sent1: The driveabilities of the car impressed the mechanic.
meanings.sent2: The driveabilities of the vehicle were tested on various terrains.
meanings.sent3: The robot's driveabilities made it the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: Her driveabilities in handling difficult situations were unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The driveabilities of the new electric car amazed everyone at the expo.

meanings.definition: The ability to be driven or controlled.
meanings.sent1: The remote control car's driveabilities delighted the children.
meanings.sent2: The driveabilities of the drone allowed for precise navigation.
meanings.sent3: The driveabilities of the toy car made it a popular choice among kids.
meanings.sent4: His driveabilities in managing the team were commendable.
meanings.sent5: The driveabilities of the robot vacuum cleaner saved time and effort.

meanings.definition: The capacity to be driven or operated.
meanings.sent1: The driveabilities of the tractor made farming tasks easier.
meanings.sent2: The driveabilities of the machine were enhanced with the new software.
meanings.sent3: The driveabilities of the smartwatch surprised the users with its features.
meanings.sent4: Her driveabilities in multitasking were put to the test during the project.
meanings.sent5: The driveabilities of the drone showcased its advanced technology.
